property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, draw 1 additional card during the draw phase. If it is Winter, draw 1 less card (to a minimum of 1) during the draw phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raven. Creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach Black Raven to your House card and discard all other Raven attachments from play. It is Summer. Each player takes 1 additional gold token when he or she counts income.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to non-Raven cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a player's House card. After you play Summer Tax, draw a card. If it is Summer, attached card's owner needs 1 additional power to win the game. If it is Winter, attached card's owner needs 1 less power to win the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon. Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender, and does not count its STR for dominance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your House card. If if is Summer, when you declare a challenge type, your opponent must declare defenders before you declare attackers. The opportunity for your opponent to declare defenders after you declare attackers is lost.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is another Queen character in play, Jeyne Westerling cannot attack, defend, or trigger her character ability. Any Phase: Kneel Jeyne Westerling to search your deck for a King character, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, stand Priestess of the Pyre each time an event card is played. If it is Winter, kneel Priestess of the Pyre each time an event card is played.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. Queen.

property.name: Text
property.value: If there is another Queen character in play, Selyse Baratheon cannot attack, defend, or trigger her character ability. Dominance: If it is Summer, pay 1 gold to shuffle the top card of your discard pile back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, Summer's Champion gains renown. If it is Winter, Summer's Champion gets -2 STR and cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Scavengers of the Sea from your hand, choose a player with a Greyjoy or a Martell House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Greyjoy only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Army. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, stand Fairweather Followers each time an event card is played. If it is Winter, kneel Fairweather Followers each time an event card is played.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Asshai.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter and you reveal a plot card, kneel Red Warlock. Response: After Red Warlock enters play, if it is Summer, search your deck for an attachment and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bannerman. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is not Winter, House Dayne characters get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If it is Summer, kneel Maester of the Sun and discard a card from your hand to save a Martell character from being killed or discarded from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Army. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knights of the Sun gets +1 STR for each gold token on it. Marshalling: If it is Summer, move any number of gold tokens from your gold pool to Knights of the Sun.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raven. Creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Carrion Bird participated, shuffle any number of Raven cards from your discard pile, or one Raven card from play, back into their owner's decks. (Cannot be canceled.)

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should Read: '...one card with the printed Raven trait from play...

property.name: Traits
property.value: King's Landing.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is not Winter, Lion's Gate gains: ';Any Phase: Kneel Lion's Gate to discard 1 power from a non-House card in play. Then, give that card a Trait of your choice until the end of the phase.';

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...to discard 1 power from a non-House card in place...'

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: If it is Summer, kneel Summer Port to reduce the cost of the next Baratheon character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: If it is Summer, kneel Open Market and discard 2 cards from your hand to return any card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: While it is Summer, your characters get +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, any opponent with as many cards in hand as you, or more, must randomly discard a card from his or her hand at the end of the draw phase. If it is Summer, any opponent with fewer cards in hand than you draws a card at the end of the draw phase, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains the Bastard trait and gets +1 STR. All King characters get -1 STR and lose renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a Military challenge in which attached character participated and it is Winter, choose and discard a location from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raven. Creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach White Raven to your House card and discard all other Raven attachments from play. It is Winter. Each player takes 1 less gold token when he or she counts income.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to non-Raven cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Ranger of Winter gains stealth, an Intrigue icon, and does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully. Maester.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If it is not Summer, kneel Maester Vyman to cancel a triggered effect that chooses a Stark character as the only target.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Scavengers of King's Landing from your hand, choose a player with a lannister or a Stark House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, players must pay 1 gold to the treasury before triggering any effect with an influence cost.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Ice Fisherman gains a Power icon and: ';Marshalling: Kneel Ice Fisherman to take 1 gold token from any opponent's gold pool, and add it to your gold pool.';

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter and Valyrian Spirit is killed, shuffle any player's dead and discard piles back into his or her deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Bastard. Sand Snake.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Obara Sand is in your hand after your first mulligan, before you place any setup cards you may remove her from the game and take an additional mulligan.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Underhanded Assassin is attacking, participating characters with a higher STR do not count their STR.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wildling. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: Power on Kingdom locations counts towards their controller's victory total. If it is Winter, Mance Rayder gains: ';Response: After you win a challenge in which Mance Rayder participated, take control of a Kingdom location controlled by the losing opponent. Then, that location claims 1 power.';

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Kingsguard. House Dayne.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you control fewer characters than the player who is attacking you, Ser Arthur Dayne cannot be bypassed by stealth and does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Raven. Creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Carrion Bird participated, shuffle any number of Raven cards from your discard pile, or one Raven card from play, back into their owner's decks. (Cannot be canceled.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: If it is Winter, kneel Northern Cave to choose any number of participating characters you control, and remove those characters from the current challenge. Then, stand those characters.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, your Baratheon characters gain the Night's Watch trait and do not kneel to defend.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer, discard Frozen Sea from play. If it is Winter, each opponent cannot initiate more than 2 challenges against you each phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you reveal a plot card and it is Summer, kneel all Greyjoy Warship locations you control. Any Phase: If it is Winter, kneel Winter Armada to choose an attacking Greyjoy character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +4 STR and gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: While it is Winter, opponent's characters get -1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a player's House card. (Limit 1 per House card.) If it is Winter, all characters with attached card's House affiliation get -1 STR. If it is Summer, return The Long Winter to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's income providing card. If it is Winter, attached card does not provide an income bonus. If it is Summer, when you count income you may also count the income bonus on the attached card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Burning Sword gains: ';Any Phase: Kneel Burning Sword to give attached character +2 STR and 'immune to card effects' until the end of the phase.';

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Unique character only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a player's House card (Limit 1 per House card.) If it is Summer, all characters with attached card's House affiliation get +1 STR. If it is Winter, return The Long Summer to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After the season changes to Winter or to Summer, kill attached character (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Shadow Stalker attacked alone and it is Winter, choose and kill a character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ironborn. Army.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Summer and you reveal a plot card, kneel Wintertime Marauders. Response: If it is Winter and you win a challenge in which Wintertime Marauders is participating, choose and discard a non-unique card from play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Ward.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are playing a Stark House card, reduce the gold penalty to play Theon Greyjoy by 1. Response: After you win a challenge in which Theon Greyjoy participated, choose a Stark or Greyjoy character. If it is Summer, stand that character. If it is Winter, kill that character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Maester. Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: If it is not Winter, kneel Maester Aemon to save a Night's Watch character from being killed.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Boon.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The 'Any Phase' ability should read: 'Response: If it is not...'

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Southron Scavengers from your hand, choose a player with a Martell or Greyjoy House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. House Frey.

property.name: Text
property.value: After at least 1 defender is declared during a challenge, kneel Walder Frey to have him participate on the side that is currently winning the challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: If it is Winter, Secret Hideout gains Stalwart when you play it from your hand. Any Phase: Until the end of the phase, players draw cards from the bottoms of their decks.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: If there is at least 1 Military Battle plot card revealed, pay 1 gold or kneel a War character to choose and kneel a character or location. Then, discard 1 power from the target.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel 2 influence to choose a unique Baratheon character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains vigilant.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a participating Ironborn character. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains intimidate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel a Dragon character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Each player must choose and kneel a character with an Intrigue icon he or she controls, if able. Then, the player who knelt the character with the highest STR may choose and return a character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Martell only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters lose all immunities. Any Phase: If it is not the marshalling phase, kneel 3 influence and discard Den of the Wolf from play (cannot be saved) to repeat the current phase at the end of the phase. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, search your deck for a Raven card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to give Unconventional Warfare the Military Battle, Power Struggle or Intrigue Gambit trait until the end of the phase.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: If attached character is Ser Arthur Dayne, he gets +5 STR. Challenges: If attached character is participating in a challenge in which an opponent has more participating characters than you, kneel Dawn to choose and kill a participating character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Dayne character only.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you play Northern Scavengers from your hand, choose a player with a Stark or a lannister House card. Discard a card at random from that player's hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Maester.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After Grand Maester Pycelle is killed in the challenge phase, return all of your used plots to your plot deck. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. King.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Renly Baratheon is the only King in play, he gains: ';After you win a Power challenge and there is at least 1 Power Struggle plot card revealed, draw a card.';

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: If it is Summer, choose an opponent's attachment in play. Pay that attachment's printed gold cost to take control of that attachment, and attach it to a card of your choice.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should be: 'Limit once per attachment per phase.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Night's Watch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Raven card is played, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you reveal an Intrigue Gambit plot card, kneel a character with an Intrigue icon to kneel all characters with a Military icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you reveal a Power Struggle plot card, kneel a character with a Power icon to kneel all characters with an Intrigue icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

card.name: At the Point of a Blade

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you reveal a Military Battle plot card, kneel a character with a Military icon to kneel all characters with a Power icon. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

property.value: Response: After an opponent wins a Military challenge against you, kneel and discard Winterfell Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

property.value: Response: After an opponent wins an Intrigue challenge against you, kneel and discard Lannisport Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text

property.value: Response: After an opponent wins dominance, discard Vale Rookery from play (cannot be saved) and pay 1 gold to reveal a new plot card.

property.value: Challenges: Kneel a Kingdom location to choose a participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +1 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge with fewer participating characters than your opponent, kneel The Tower of Joy to choose and kill a character controlled by the losing opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player cannot declare more than 1 attacker or defender in each challenge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any effect that would make it Summer or Winter is considered inactive while The Raven's Song is revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +1 STR and gains stealth. Response: After you play a character with stalwart from your hand, kneel 1 influence to attach Needle from your discard pile to that character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gains infamy. If attached character's controller would claim power for his or her House, that power must be placed on a character with at least one Head of a Dwarf card attached.

property.value: If you do not win dominance, pay 1 gold or discard Bolton Refugee from play.

If that opponent does not kneel a character with higher STR than Alannys Greyjoy, discard a card at random from his or her hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Epic Battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: After the dominance phase this round, there is an epic phase in which each player may initiate an additional challenge of his or her choice. Instead of the normal claim effects, any player who loses one of these challenges as the defender must select his or her next plot card at random. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of the epic phase.)

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Should read: '...a single challenge of his or her choice...'

property.name: Text
property.value: After you win a challenge and it is Summer or Winter, choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Desperate Looters enters play or leaves play, discard the top card of each opponent's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Depleted Host participated, search your deck for a Reinforcements event card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.value: If an opponent is running an agenda, Northern Cavalry Flank does not kneel to attack.

property.value: Deadly. No attachments except Siege.

property.value: If no opponent is running an agenda, Northern Infantry does not kneel to defend.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, choose an attachment controlled by an opponent. Take control of that attachment, and attach it to Destitute Horde, if able. Otherwise, discard it from play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon or Boon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, draw a card.

property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After a Reinforcements event card is played, pay 2 gold to choose a character or location that does not have its owner's House affiliation. Take control of that card. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments except Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Play before any challenges have been inititated this phase. If you lose 2 or more challenges this phase, you may return any number of non-unique characters from your discard pile to your hand. (Place this card next to your plot deck until the end of the phase.)

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: If this event's conditions are met, affected characters are returned to the player's hand at the end of the challenge phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Play if you have lost a Military challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Missing Recruit into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Military icon, stealth, and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Play if you have lost an Intrigue challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Spy in Their Midst into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Intrigue icon, stealth, and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Play if you have lost a Power challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Beguiled Bodyguard into play from your hand as a character with 3 STR, a Power icon, stealth, and renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if it is Winter. Any phase: Play if you have lost a challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Winter Reserves into play from your hand as an Army character with 4 STR, a Military , an Intrigue , a Power icon, and deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if it is Summer. Any phase: Play if you have lost a challenge this phase. Pay 1 gold to put Summer Reserves into play from your hand as an Army character with 4 STR, a Military , an Intrigue , a Power icon, and deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The East.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: If it is Summer, kneel Summer Encampment to return a character you control to its owner's hand.
